price: Ey iman edenler! Sabredin, (kâfirlere karşı) sabırlı olmada sebatkar olun, (cihad için) nöbet bekleyin! Allah’tan korkun ki kurtuluşa eresiniz.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱصۡبِرُواْ وَصَابِرُواْ وَرَابِطُواْ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū iṣ'birū waṣābirū warābiṭū wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
